item.description:
It's Spike the Punch for some Dancing at the Scoreboard (inside the Crown Plaza) in Woburn.

We can meet at one of Woburns hot spots and listen to a great live band, with tunes of the top 40's, food is optional. Looking forward to a fun filled night.Try to come early for good seating Fridays are busy.

Band:Spike the Punch

Band starts at 9:00-1am

Will have meet up sign posted on the table and ask the hostess when you come in for Eva's tables.

www.spikethepunch.com

Hope tosee you there!!

 

There is one request please be responsible for your ***own Tab***  perhaps bring cash pay as you go along..I do not want any open tabs, this is a nice place and have done many events here. Thanking you in advance.
item.name: Dance to Live Band "Spike The Punch" Friday Night
